languages.text: "А когда же еще, шерин!" {n}Сверкнув глазами, Джай переходит на шепот.{/n} "Ты разве не видишь, что все тут приготовились к смерти? Я не желаю проводить, возможно, последние моменты своей жизни в столь ужасной атмосфере!"

"If not now, when, shereen?" {n}Her eyes blazing, Jae drops her voice to a whisper:{/n} "Don't you see that everyone in this place is simply waiting to die? I refuse to spend what could be the last moments of my life under this cloud of doom!"
languages.original_text: "А когда же еще, шерин!" {n}Сверкнув глазами, Джай переходит на шепот.{/n} "Ты разве не видишь, что все тут приготовились к смерти? Я не желаю проводить, возможно, последние моменты своей жизни в столь ужасной атмосфере!"

traits.locale_text: "If not now, when, shereen?" {n}Her eyes blazing, Jae drops her voice to a whisper:{/n} "Don't you see that everyone in this place is simply waiting to die? I refuse to spend what could be the last moments of my life under this cloud of doom!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If not now, when, shereen?" {n}Her eyes blazing, Jae drops her voice to a whisper:{/n} "Don't you see that everyone in this place is simply waiting to die? I refuse to spend what could be the last moments of my life under this cloud of doom!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If not now, when, shereen?" {n}Her eyes blazing, Jae drops her voice to a whisper:{/n} "Don't you see that everyone in this place is simply waiting to die? I refuse to spend what could be the last moments of my life under this cloud of doom!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "If not now, when, shereen?" {n}Her eyes blazing, Jae drops her voice to a whisper:{/n} "Don't you see that everyone in this place is simply waiting to die? I refuse to spend what could be the last moments of my life under this cloud of doom!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “如果现在不庆祝，那还要什么时候庆祝，亲爱的？”{n}婕伊瞪大了眼睛，声音压低得仿佛耳语一般。{/n}“难道你看不出来吗？这里的每个人都在坐以待毙。我可不打算在这愁云惨雾之中度过我人生最后的时光！”
languages.original_text: "If not now, when, shereen?" {n}Her eyes blazing, Jae drops her voice to a whisper:{/n} "Don't you see that everyone in this place is simply waiting to die? I refuse to spend what could be the last moments of my life under this cloud of doom!"

traits.locale_text: “如果现在不庆祝，那还要什么时候庆祝，亲爱的？”{n}婕伊瞪大了眼睛，声音压低得仿佛耳语一般。{/n}“难道你看不出来吗？这里的每个人都在坐以待毙。我可不打算在这愁云惨雾之中度过我人生最后的时光！”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「今でなければ、いつなの、シャリーン？」{n}目を爛々と輝かせながら、ジェイは声を囁くように落とした。{/n}「ここにいる誰もが、ただ死を待っているのがわからないの？あたしは、この破滅の雲の下で人生の最後の瞬間を過ごしたくはない！」
languages.original_text: "If not now, when, shereen?" {n}Her eyes blazing, Jae drops her voice to a whisper:{/n} "Don't you see that everyone in this place is simply waiting to die? I refuse to spend what could be the last moments of my life under this cloud of doom!"

traits.locale_text: 「今でなければ、いつなの、シャリーン？」{n}目を爛々と輝かせながら、ジェイは声を囁くように落とした。{/n}「ここにいる誰もが、ただ死を待っているのがわからないの？あたしは、この破滅の雲の下で人生の最後の瞬間を過ごしたくはない！」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¿Si no ahora, cuándo, shereen?». {n}Con ojos ardientes, Jae baja la voz hasta un susurro:{/n} «¿No ve que todo el mundo aquí está esperando que le llegue la hora sin más? ¡Me niego a pasar los que podrían ser mis últimos momentos bajo una nube de tristeza!».
languages.original_text: "If not now, when, shereen?" {n}Her eyes blazing, Jae drops her voice to a whisper:{/n} "Don't you see that everyone in this place is simply waiting to die? I refuse to spend what could be the last moments of my life under this cloud of doom!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Si no ahora, cuándo, shereen?». {n}Con ojos ardientes, Jae baja la voz hasta un susurro:{/n} «¿No ve que todo el mundo aquí está esperando que le llegue la hora sin más? ¡Me niego a pasar los que podrían ser mis últimos momentos bajo una nube de tristeza!».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Autant profiter de cette occasion, shereen. Vous ne voyez donc pas que tout le monde ici attend simplement la mort ? {n}ajoute Jae en murmurant, le regard brûlant.{/n} Je refuse de passer ce qui pourrait être mes derniers instants sous ce nuage morose ! »
languages.original_text: "If not now, when, shereen?" {n}Her eyes blazing, Jae drops her voice to a whisper:{/n} "Don't you see that everyone in this place is simply waiting to die? I refuse to spend what could be the last moments of my life under this cloud of doom!"

traits.locale_text: « Autant profiter de cette occasion, shereen. Vous ne voyez donc pas que tout le monde ici attend simplement la mort ? {n}ajoute Jae en murmurant, le regard brûlant.{/n} Je refuse de passer ce qui pourrait être mes derniers instants sous ce nuage morose ! »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn nicht jetzt, wann dann, Shereen?" {n}Jae senkt die Stimme und flüstert, ihre Augen sind dabei voller Feuer:{/n} "Merkt Ihr nicht, dass alle hier nur darauf warten zu sterben? Das sind vielleicht die letzten Momente meines Lebens und ich sehe nicht ein, sie in dieser Untergangsstimmung zu verbringen!"
languages.original_text: "If not now, when, shereen?" {n}Her eyes blazing, Jae drops her voice to a whisper:{/n} "Don't you see that everyone in this place is simply waiting to die? I refuse to spend what could be the last moments of my life under this cloud of doom!"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn nicht jetzt, wann dann, Shereen?" {n}Jae senkt die Stimme und flüstert, ihre Augen sind dabei voller Feuer:{/n} "Merkt Ihr nicht, dass alle hier nur darauf warten zu sterben? Das sind vielleicht die letzten Momente meines Lebens und ich sehe nicht ein, sie in dieser Untergangsstimmung zu verbringen!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Şimdi kutlama yapmayacağız da ne zaman yapacağız şirinim?" {n}Gözleri alev alev yanan Jae, sesini alçaltıp fısıldamaya başlıyor.{/n} "Buradaki herkesin yalnızca ölmeyi beklediğini görmüyor musun? Hayatımın belki de son anlarını böyle kasvet içinde geçirmeyi reddediyorum!"
languages.original_text: "If not now, when, shereen?" {n}Her eyes blazing, Jae drops her voice to a whisper:{/n} "Don't you see that everyone in this place is simply waiting to die? I refuse to spend what could be the last moments of my life under this cloud of doom!"

traits.locale_text: "Şimdi kutlama yapmayacağız da ne zaman yapacağız şirinim?" {n}Gözleri alev alev yanan Jae, sesini alçaltıp fısıldamaya başlıyor.{/n} "Buradaki herkesin yalnızca ölmeyi beklediğini görmüyor musun? Hayatımın belki de son anlarını böyle kasvetli bir havada geçirmeyi reddediyorum!"
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
